blocks.name: iprodclim
blocks.content: An infinite product equals the value its sequence converges to. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iprodclim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, c0, wex(s2, wa(wne(cv(s2), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s1), cmul, c4), cli, cv(s2))))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, cmul, c4), cli, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, c0, c1), c2, cfv(cli, cseq(c3, cmul, c4)), w0)
  iprod(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  mpsyl(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c3, cmul, c4)), c2), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(c3, cmul, c4), cli, c2))
  ax-mp(wfun(cli), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  funbrfv(cli, cseq(c3, cmul, c4), c2)
}

thm iprodclim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2,(s2 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(s1(×, c4))[~~>]s2))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c4 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(×, c4))[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, (~~> ` seq(c3(×, c4))), w0)
  iprod(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  mpsyl(w0, (~~> ` seq(c3(×, c4)))= c2, Fun(~~>), seq(c3(×, c4))[~~>]c2)
  ax-mp(Fun(~~>), (~~> : dom(~~>)→ ℂ))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, dom(~~>), cc)
  funbrfv(cli, seq(c3(×, c4)), c2)
}

blocks.name: iprodclim2
blocks.content: A converging product converges to its infinite product. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iprodclim2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, cprod(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, c2, wex(s2, wa(wne(cv(s2), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s1), cmul, c1), cli, cv(s2))))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, cprod(s0, c2, c3), cfv(cli, cseq(c0, cmul, c1)), w0)
  sylib(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cli, cfv(cli, cseq(c0, cmul, c1))), wcel(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), cdm(cli)))
  ntrivcvg(s1, s2, s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  climdm(cseq(c0, cmul, c1))
  iprod(s0, s1, s2, c2, c3, c0, c1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

thm iprodclim2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → seq(c0(×, c1))[~~>]prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2,(s2 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(s1(×, c1))[~~>]s2))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c1 ` s0)= c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(seq(c0(×, c1)), cli, prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3), (~~> ` seq(c0(×, c1))), w0)
  sylib(w0, seq(c0(×, c1))[~~>](~~> ` seq(c0(×, c1))), seq(c0(×, c1))∈ dom(~~>))
  ntrivcvg(s1, s2, s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqeltrd((c1 ` s0), cc, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  climdm(seq(c0(×, c1)))
  iprod(s0, s1, s2, c2, c3, c0, c1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: iprodclim3
blocks.content: The sequence of partial finite product of a converging infinite product converge to the infinite product of the series. Note that ` j ` must not occur in ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Dec-2017.)

thm iprodclim3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cprod(s0, c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, c1, wex(s2, wa(wne(cv(s2), nat0), wbr(cseq(cv(s1), cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cli, cv(s2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cprod(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, cprod(s0, c1, c2), cfv(cli, c0), w0)
  sylib(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(cli, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  climdm(c0)
  eqtrd(cprod(s0, c1, c2), cfv(cli, c0), cfv(cli, cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))), w0)
  syl5eqr(cprod(s0, c1, c2), cfv(cli, cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))), cprod(hs0, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))), w0)
  prodfc(hs0, s0, c1, c2)
  iprod(hs0, s1, s2, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), c3, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cli, cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))), cfv(cli, c0), cio(hs1, wbr(cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cli, cv(hs1))), cio(hs1, wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs1))), w0)
  iotabidv(hs1, w0, wbr(cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(c0, cli, cv(hs1)))
  climeq(s3, cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cv(hs1), c0, c1, c3, universe, cdm(cli), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), universe))
  seqex(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  eqtr2d(cfv(cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cv(s3)), cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cprod(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c1)))
  syl5eqr(cprod(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2), cfv(cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cv(s3)), cprod(hs0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c1)))
  eqtri(cprod(hs0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))), cprod(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2), cprod(hs0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), cfv(cmpt(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2), cv(hs0))))
  prodeq2i(hs0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2), cv(hs0)))
  syl5reqr(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3))), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3))))
  fveq1i(cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3))), cv(hs0), cmpt(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3))), cmpt(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2)), wss(co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c1))

  fvres(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  prodfc(hs0, s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)), c2)

  eqidd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)))))
  syl6eleq(cv(s3), cfv(cuz, c3), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c1))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3))), wcel(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cc))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3))), wcel(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cc), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eleqr(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cfz, cv(s3))))
  elfzuz(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s3))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c1, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cc, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, cc, w0)
  df-fv(hs1, cli, cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
  df-fv(hs1, cli, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))
  diff.cmpt.s(s2, s0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cseq.s(s3, c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.cmul.s(s3)
  diff.cmpt.s(s3, s0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c3, cfz, cv(s3)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cfz, cv(s3))
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s3))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), c1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cseq(c3, cmul, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(cli)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm iprodclim3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]prod(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2,(s2 ≠ 0 ∧ seq(s1(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))[~~>]s2))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c1)→(c0 ` s3)= prod(s0 ∈(c3[...]s3), c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, prod(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (~~> ` c0), w0)
  sylib(w0, c0[~~>](~~> ` c0), c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  climdm(c0)
  eqtrd(prod(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (~~> ` c0), (~~> ` seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), w0)
  syl5eqr(prod(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (~~> ` seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), prod(hs0 ∈ c1,((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)), w0)
  prodfc(hs0, s0, c1, c2)
  iprod(hs0, s1, s2, c1, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), c3, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), w0)
  eqidd(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  3eqtr4g((~~> ` seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), (~~> ` c0), iota(hs1, seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))[~~>]hs1), iota(hs1, c0[~~>]hs1), w0)
  iotabidv(hs1, w0, seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))[~~>]hs1, c0[~~>]hs1)
  climeq(s3, seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))), hs1, c0, c1, c3, universe, dom(~~>), w0)
  a1i(w0, seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))∈ 𝕌)
  seqex(c3, cmul, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqtr2d((seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))` s3), (c0 ` s3), prod(s0 ∈(c3[...]s3), c2), (w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c1))
  syl5eqr(prod(s0 ∈(c3[...]s3), c2), (seq(c3(×,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))` s3), prod(hs0 ∈(c3[...]s3),((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)), (w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c1))
  eqtri(prod(hs0 ∈(c3[...]s3),((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)), prod(s0 ∈(c3[...]s3), c2), prod(hs0 ∈(c3[...]s3),((s0 ∈(c3[...]s3)↦ c2)` hs0)))
  prodeq2i(hs0, (c3[...]s3), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), ((s0 ∈(c3[...]s3)↦ c2)` hs0))
  syl5reqr(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), ((s0 ∈(c3[...]s3)↦ c2)` hs0), (((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|`(c3[...]s3))` hs0), hs0 ∈(c3[...]s3))
  fveq1i(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|`(c3[...]s3)), hs0, (s0 ∈(c3[...]s3)↦ c2))
  ax-mp(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|`(c3[...]s3))=(s0 ∈(c3[...]s3)↦ c2), (c3[...]s3)⊆ c1)
  sseqtr4i((c3[...]s3), c1, (ℤ≥ ` c3))
  fzssuz(c3, s3)
  resmpt(s0, (c3[...]s3), c1, c2)
  fvres(hs0, (c3[...]s3), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  prodfc(hs0, s0, (c3[...]s3), c2)
  fprodser(hs0, c3, s3, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c1))
  eqidd(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), ((w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈(c3[...]s3)))
  syl6eleq(s3, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c1, (w0 ∧ s3 ∈ c1))
  simpr(w0, s3 ∈ c1)
  adantlr(w0, s3 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(c3[...]s3), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)∈ ℂ)
  sylan2(w0, hs0 ∈(c3[...]s3), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ c1)
  syl6eleqr(hs0, c1, (ℤ≥ ` c3), hs0 ∈(c3[...]s3))
  elfzuz(hs0, c3, s3)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c1, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), cc, w0)
